channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023120173
item.description:
Report X-2023120173

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered in trailer during unload, promptly placed into sealed tote to transport to QA cage and prevent excess leaking. Damage report and ISF completed, soiled cardboard from leaking hazmat & 787085889430 placed into drum container. DescribePack: Loose cap on one 5 Liter bottle of Getinge Descaler, product leaked from this loose cap inside of packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Prompty placed into sealed tote and transported to QA cage, not placed on belt lines, instantly taken out of sortation.
